title.rendered: Division Street Elementary School Named National PTA School of Excellence

content.rendered:
The National PTA has recognized Division Street Elementary School as a 2021-2023 PTA School of Excellence. The school is one of 242 PTAs and schools nationwide to receive the honor. Division Street Elementary School PTA also earned this recognition in 2018 and in 2021.

National PTA’s School of Excellence program is a year-long commitment to improving family-school partnerships. Throughout the year, PTAs and schools collect feedback from their school communities to create and implement plans of action to make a difference for every child. Through the School of Excellence program, PTAs and families become key partners in decision-making and school improvement efforts. The program opens the lines of communication and critical thinking within school communities to make data-drive decisions that yield positive, long-term results.

“We are thrilled to once again be named a National PTA School of Excellence,” said PTA President Kelly Savalli.  “The PTA continued on our path to foster family engagement, create a welcoming environment, and support our students through interactive events and educational programs. We are looking forward to creating opportunities and fun memories for all of Division Street in the upcoming school year.”

Congratulations to Division Street Elementary School PTA on this great achievement. For more information about the National PTA School of Excellence program, visit PTA.org/Excellence.
